title: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro bonds with baby Ariana at Disney World
text:
Jersey shore star Ronnie Ortiz-Magro bonded with his daughter Ariana at Disney World in Florida on Saturday.

The father-daughter outing came after an emergency protective order banning him from going near Ariana's mother expired on Friday, after Jen Harley failed to appear in court.

Social media footage showed one-year-old Ariana smiling as she went on a ride cradled in her father's arms. The two mug for the camera together and kiss in the short video, posted to Instagram by Ortiz-Magro.

Ronnie Ortiz-Magro kisses baby Ariana at Disney... after police emergency protective order details how he told ex Jen Harley 'he was going to kill her'

Having fun: The outing came after the protective order expired on Friday

Having fun: Ronnie's ex Jen Harley did not appear to be present

The outing comes as the LAPD emergency protective order against Ortiz-Magro was made public, detailing how he threatened to 'kill' Harley during a violen drug-fueled altercation.

The fight led to his kidnapping arrest - although insiders in his camp deny to TMZ that he made any death threat.

'Suspect told victim he was going to kill her. Suspect pushed victim out the house. Suspect ran after victim,' reads the emergency protective order.

'Victim knocked on neighbor's door and set baby on ground. Suspect grabbed baby and dragged victim to the ground. Suspect punched victim with closed fist on face, causing visible injury,' the order continues.

Details emerge: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro told Jen Harley 'he was going to kill her,' according to the LAPD emergency protective order against him

Ronnie could not go within 100 yards of either Jen or their 18-month-old daughter Ariana, who was present during the incident in the small hours of October 4.

However, the court lifted the emergency protective order on Friday after Jen failed to appear at a hearing that day.

Prior to her no-show, TMZ reported Ronnie had no intention of contesting Jen's bid to have the order extended until his arraignment.

Held at a distance: Ronnie cannot go within 100 yards of either Jen or their 18-month-old daughter Ariana, who was present during the incident in the small hours of October 4

Ronnie allegedly 'slapped and punched Jen' before chasing her around their AirBnB with a knife while he was carrying Ariana, according to TMZ.

His sources insist Jen was under the influence of alcohol that night and had in TMZ's words 'dangled Ariana over a fence,' leaving Ronnie frightened for his child.

The gossip site reported that police 'broke down the door' to the rental because they were worried the little girl was in danger.

Ronnie reportedly refused to 'go peacefully' and officers were forced to use a taser on the muscle-bound reality star.

Fox 11 footage showed officers placing the topless Ortiz-Magro on a gurney in a seated position and restraining his hands.

Records reveal he was booked into the system at 8am on Friday, October 4 and was released that day at 11.26am.
description: The father-daughter outing came after an emergency protective order banning him from going near Ariana's mother expired on Friday, after  Jen Harley failed to appear in court.
